name: Bodily Visions
description:
Receive three cards at random and begin to construct an adventure through your home and body.

Each card represents a location, and the three you get form a path of movement for you to follow: beginning at the first, detouring through the second and ending at the third.

Alongside each location is a prompt for further exploration. While you traverse your path, read each prompt and incorporate it within your body. As you move from place to place, you may feel the need to re-order, re-interpret, fragment or reject individual prompts as they come.

It is up to you to negotiate how your path will be travelled.

Original text commissioned by Dancehouse Diary, Melbourne, July 2020. It can be viewed in its original form here: Dancehouse Diary Issue 12.1: What Now? — Interior Lives.
